<p><i>[ Note: Jackson announces the birth of his daughter, Mary Graham. The baby died on May 25.]</i></p>
<p>
Lexington, VA.<br/>
May 1st/58<br/>
My Dear Brother
</p><p>
We have a little prodigy one day old this afternoon. She calls herself Mary Graham Jackson. Anna is doing very well, & joins me in love to yourself and sister Eugenia.
</p><p>
Your affectionate brother,
</p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=jjt" rel="me">T. J. Jackson</a>
